summary: This module defines in‑memory representations of AWS API Gateway V2 entities—such as APIs, routes, integrations, authorizers, domain names, stages, and VPC links—and a backend class that orchestrates their lifecycle (create, read, update, delete) with JSON/YAML serialization and tagging support.
business_intent: Provide a fully functional mock of the AWS API Gateway V2 service for local testing and development, enabling applications to interact with simulated API resources without contacting the real AWS endpoints.
